SignalProcessing.calculate_standardized_noise(DFF: ndarray, FrameRate: float) → Union[float, ndarray]

Calculates standardized noise, see: https://www.nature.com/articles/s41593-021-00895-5

Parameters

  • DFF (Any) – Fluorescence over Baseline (DF/F)

  • FrameRate (float) – Imaging framerate

Returns

standardized noise

Return type

Any
